name: Sofhep 400 mg tablet
description: Sofosbuvir is a direct-acting antiviral medicine used in combination with other antiviral medicines to treat chronic Hepatitis C, an infectious hepatic disease caused as a result of infection by Hepatitis C Virus (HCV). It is also recommended in cases of hepatitis C and liver cancer who are about to get a liver transplant. Sofosbuvir reduces the chances of infection recurrence following the transplant.
